name: Molecollide
description:
Have you ever wonder how it is to be a molecule?

Now you can!

Play as a molecule that needs to make a reaction - find the appropriate molecule to collide with and become a new molecule. 

Control the player by using arrow keys, or WASD. 

After making all the correct reactions, your are finished!

Made by By Pontus Jakobsson (Sound), Jari Hanski (Programming), & Amanda Backlund (Art) during an experimental game design course.
